statements: SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT dark_mode, currency FROM user_preferences WHERE notification_sound = true;
SELECT user_id, currency FROM user_preferences WHERE dark_mode = false;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE notification_sound = false;
SELECT currency FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = '33333333-3333-3333-3333-333333333333';
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE dark_mode = true;
SELECT user_id, currency FROM user_preferences WHERE notification_sound = false;
SELECT user_id, currency FROM user_preferences WHERE dark_mode = true AND notification_sound = true;
SELECT user_id, currency FROM user_preferences WHERE currency = 'USD';
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE currency = 'EUR' AND notification_sound = true;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 100
SELECT theme, language FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 200
SELECT user_id, timezone FROM user_preferences WHERE theme = 'Dark'
SELECT * FROM trading_settings WHERE user_id = 300
SELECT risk_level, auto_trade FROM trading_settings WHERE notification_emails = true
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, theme FROM user_preferences WHERE theme = 'Dark';
SELECT * FROM user_preferences JOIN trading_settings ON user_preferences.user_id = trading_settings.user_id WHERE trading_settings.auto_trade = TRUE;
SELECT theme, language FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY theme DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE language LIKE 'Eng%' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, theme, language, timezone FROM user_preferences;
SELECT asset_name, quantity, current_price FROM trading_assets WHERE asset_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM trade_history WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY trade_date DESC;
SELECT theme, language FROM user_preferences WHERE theme = 'dark' AND language = 'English';
SELECT asset_name, quantity, current_price FROM trading_assets WHERE quantity > 1000 ORDER BY current_price ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE theme = 'dark';
SELECT user_id, theme, language FROM user_preferences WHERE language = 'English' AND timezone = 'UTC';
SELECT user_id, theme, language, timezone FROM user_preferences WHERE theme = 'light' ORDER BY language DESC;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, quantity FROM trading_assets WHERE current_price > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT trade_id, user_id, asset_id, trade_type, trade_date FROM trade_history WHERE trade_type = 'buy' ORDER BY trade_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profile;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profile WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT currency_name, base_currency, target_currency FROM currency_pairs WHERE currency_id = 1001;
SELECT user_id, theme, language FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 500;
SELECT trade_id, amount, trade_date FROM trade_history ORDER BY trade_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profile;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_profile WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_profile.username, user_preferences.theme, user_preferences.language FROM user_profile JOIN user_preferences ON user_profile.user_id = user_preferences.user_id;
SELECT user_profile.username, trade_history.amount, trade_history.trade_date FROM user_profile JOIN trade_history ON user_profile.user_id = trade_history.user_id WHERE trade_history.amount > 1000;

SELECT trade_history.trade_id, trade_history.amount, currency_pairs.currency_name FROM trade_history JOIN currency_pairs ON trade_history.currency_id = currency_pairs.currency_id ORDER BY trade_history.trade_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT user_id, full_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE timezone = 'UTC';
SELECT asset_name, symbol, price FROM cryptocurrency_assets ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT user_id, theme_color, language FROM user_preferences WHERE notifications = TRUE;
SELECT trade_id, user_id, asset_id, action, amount, timestamp FROM trade_history ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT user_id, full_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE timezone='GMT';
SELECT asset_name, symbol, price FROM cryptocurrency_assets ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT user_id, theme_color, language FROM user_preferences WHERE notifications=true;
SELECT trade_id, user_id, asset_id, action, amount, timestamp FROM trade_history WHERE timestamp > '2021-10-01' ORDER BY amount DESC;
